discontinue drug/substance
• Identify co-morbid conditions and treat sexually transmitted diseases
• Multidisciplinary team management
o Address psychosocial aspects: support systems, place of safety, look out for suicidal ideations
o Address nutrition: advise on the importance of good nutrition
o Monitor maternal and fetal status
• Pain management plan: they are more sensitive to pain, and may need high doses of analgesia
• Withdrawal symptoms: offer support care, nutrition, hydration, analgesi
